com.burstly.lib.component
Class BurstlyAdaptorController

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.BurstlyAdaptorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdaptorController, OverlayContainer.IOverlayListener
public class BurstlyAdaptorController
extends Object

Burstly adaptor controller. It controls burstly related ads.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

setPrefetchedRequest

public void setPrefetchedRequest(boolean isPrefetchedRequest)
Description copied from interface: IAdaptorController
Set to true if this component was prefetched. This means that no standard lifecycle should be invoked. Component will be created but won't be shown until next request for ad.

Specified by:
setPrefetchedRequest in interface IAdaptorController
Parameters:
isPrefetchedRequest - the isPrefetchRequest to set
